venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Every Thursday is trivia night at Chuck's. People compete in teams of roughly six people. An emcee reads a question, and the team bids a certain number of points on the question, depending on confidence level. Prizes are awarded to the winning team. Usually a gift certificate to Chuck's
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a 5x7 meetup sign; plus I will give out cell # closer to event
item.name: Trivia night at Chuck's
